text: E=MC² (abbreviation of Emancipation=Mariah Carey²) is the eleventh album by American singer-songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released in the United States on April 15, 2008. The album's lead single "Touch My Body" became Carey's eighteenth number single on Billboard Hot 100. == Track listing == ==Release history== Country Release (Standard Edition) Format Label Austria April 4, 2008 CD, digital download The Island Def Jam Music Group Italy Belgium April 11, 2008 Germany Universal Music Group Ireland The Island Def Jam Music Group Norway Australia April 14, 2008 France New Zealand United Kingdom Mercury Records Canada April 15, 2008 Universal Music Group Japan The Island Def Jam Music Group Mexico United States == References == Category:2008 albums Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Gospel albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Island Records albums
title: E=MC² (album)
